infos.name: pantry
infos.desc:
You've just walked into a pantry.

 You make out a folding chair. You shudder, but continue examining the folding chair. [if there is something on the s_0]You see [a list of things on the s_0] on the folding chair, so there's that.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0]Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it.[end if] You can see a shelf. [if there is something on the s_1]You see [a list of things on the s_1] on the shelf.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1]Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it.[end if]

infos.name: eggs
infos.desc: You couldn't pay me to eat that [noun].

metadata.goal: Look for anything that is out of place and put it away in its proper location.

objective: Welcome to TextWorld! You find yourself in a messy house. Many things are not in their usual location. Let's clean up this place. After you'll have done, this little house is going to be spick and span! Look for anything that is out of place and put it away in its proper location.
